body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Murphy's Auto Solutions. My name is Mark Murphy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Victoria Peterson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. Can you please provide me with the VIN number of the car in question?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN number is seven three five zero eight one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also provide me with the date of purchase of the vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I purchased the car on the twenty third of April, two zero one four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Victoria. We will look into your concerns regarding the product quality of your vehicle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time in communicating this matter with us. Thank you and have a great day.
